summary: A laborer moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich. But ends up using his kung fu skills to survive.
cast: Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Luxia Jiang|Philip Ng|Andy On|Kuan Tai Chen|Cheung-Yan Yuen|Hark-On Fung|Jiaolong Sun|Junjie Mao|Meilin Mo|Michelle Hu|Fengchao Liu|Yongchen Liu|Chunyuan Wang|Yi-Yi Yang|Duo Ba|Peng Huang|Ruixiang Zhu|Yong Lu|Sheng Ning
title: E zhan
